com.arasthel.spannedgridlayoutmanager

Class SpannedGridLayoutManager

  • com.arasthel.spannedgridlayoutmanager.SpannedGridLayoutManager

  • public class SpannedGridLayoutManager

    A android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager which layouts and orders its views based on width and height spans.

    See Also:
    android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager

    • Field Detail

      • rectsHelper

        public RectsHelper rectsHelper

        Helper get free rects to place views

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpannedGridLayoutManager

        public SpannedGridLayoutManager(SpannedGridLayoutManager.Orientation orientation,
                                int spans)

        A android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager which layouts and orders its views based on width and height spans.

        Parameters:
        orientation - Whether the views will be layouted and scrolled in vertical or horizontal
        spans - How many spans does the layout have per row or column
        See Also:
        android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager

      • fillBefore

        public void fillBefore(int position,
                       android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Recycler recycler,
                       int extraSpace)

        Fill gaps before the given position

        Parameters:
        position - Item position in adapter
        recycler - Recycler
        extraSpace - Extra space to add to current scroll and use as limit for filling the gaps
